Posts.Content: Jul 27, 2009 06:46AM tpillsbu wrote: I am planning a carribean cruise in Oct after my taxol finishes up in September. My onc says I can sign up, as I should be ok. Just finished AC. I am also worried about lymphedema on the plane and due to the weather. Can a preventitive compression garment hurt if done thru a qualified therapist? I also have the chance to go to NYC in Sept and the fear of lympedema seems to be replacing my other BC fears as we roll along here!  I have had some slight swelling at times already.
Posts.Title: Avoiding LE in my state's heat/humidity Artemis kira
